gov.nasa.jpf.util

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.util.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends Object
    utility class to find all files matching (possibly hierarchical) wildcard path specs we support single '*' wildcards as in filename matching, plus "**" patterns that match all (recursive) subdirectories

    • Constructor Summary

      FileUtils()

      • asCanonicalUnixPath

        public static String asCanonicalUnixPath(String p)
        turn a mixed path list into a valid Unix path set without drive letters, and with '/' and ':' separators. Also remove multiple consecutive separators this assumes the path String to be already expanded

      • asCanonicalWindowsPath

        public static String asCanonicalWindowsPath(String p)
        turn a mixed path list into a valid Windows path set with drive letters, and '\' and ';' separators. Also remove multiple consecutive separators this assumes the path String to be already expanded
